bio: A creative and problem-solving software engineer passionate about professional and personal growth. I thrive on solving complex challenges, continuously learning, and contributing to innovative and collaborative projects that drive meaningful advancements in Information Technology.

funFact.text: I once deployed a full app in under 24 hours and it's still running in production today!

milestones.title: AI Engineer at VMO Holdings
milestones.description: Provided AI solutions for various services, including using latest LLM and advanced techniques to meet customer needs.

milestones.title: Natural Language Processing Engineer at The Institute of Big Data (VinBigdata)
milestones.description: Conducted research in information retrieval to enhance search algorithms, improving search functionality.

milestones.title: Lecturer at MindX Technology School
milestones.description: Specialized in teaching programming courses to kids such as Scratch, Game Programming, and Python.

milestones.title: Teaching Assistant at Hanoi University of Science and Technology
milestones.description: Supported instructors in delivering lectures for Database and Techniques of Programming courses at Hanoi University of Science and Technology.

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Engineering
education.institution: Hanoi University of Science and Technology
education.description: Focused on software development, algorithms, and data structures. Completed a final year project on natural language processing.
